title: The Vampires' Last Lover
description: Intelligent, pretty, and athletically gifted, Txema Ybarra should be enjoying college life and her entrance into adulthood. And for a moment, she does...Until the vampires show up.Born with an unusual ‘twin teardrop’ birthmark on her neck, Txema (pronounced Chema) is one of only a handful of females in the world who bears this trait.Unfortunately, it marks her as a vessel of eternal youth and beauty for an elite vampire society determined to protect her precious blood.Txema will also cross paths with a far deadlier brotherhood of vampires...a group determined to destroy humankind and claim power from their close brethren.Caught in the middle of this war after all the other bearers of the birthmark are murdered, Txema must flee America and head to France under the protection of five beautiful vampires who all have a vested interest in her survival.The race is on to save her blood, as well as her very life, to ensure the survival of Les Amantes de Vampire.Otherwise, Txema will be... the vampires’ last lover.
author: Aiden James
